text: Heather Marie TomOwens, Devin. "In the Middle." http://www.soapoperadigest.com/content/middle-0 (born November 4, 1975 in Illinois) is an American actress who acts primarily in soap operas. She represented Victoria Newman in the CBS soap The Young and the Restless. She also acted in other soap operas. In August 2011, Tom said she was engaged to her partner of 15 years, James Achor. On September 17, 2011, the pair married. On May 19, 2012, it was said that the couple was expecting their first child together. Tom later said she was due around October and was expecting a boy. Her sister, Nicholle Tom, is also an actress. Heather Tom was born in Hinsdale, Illinois. ==Filmography== Film Film Film Film Year Movie Role Notes 1990 She'll Take Romance Caroline 1995 Deadly Whispers Kathy Acton 2004 Delusion Veronica Farrow
